# ImagePresentationComponent.ViewingMode

**Structure**

Image content’s rendering mode.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ViewingMode
```

## Monoscopic presentation

- **mono**: Displays the image with a monoscopic presentation.

## Stereoscopic presentation of spatial photos

- **spatialStereo**: Displays the image’s spatial stereo representation (if available) with a windowed presentation style.
- **spatialStereoImmersive**: Displays the image’s spatial stereo representation (if available) with an immersive presentation style.

## 3D presentation of generated spatial scenes

- **spatial3D**: Displays the image’s spatial 3D representation (if generated) with a windowed presentation style.
- **spatial3DImmersive**: Displays the image’s spatial 3D representation (if generated) with an immersive presentation style.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
